Windlord::

"Ok, Lets go Cooley"said Windlord and looking to sky he said "I 
don't know why... but I want to do this quick, I have abad feeling"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> SureStrike:Looked to WinLord and pointed to the mountains to the 
east. " Go check there with umm Cooley, Keep in contact with 
everyone." As Cooley went to interject to SureStrikes orders 
SureStrike responded, "Your weapons will defend you guys better if 
there are clones here."
> Cooley:At that he looked to WinLord, "Mind if we get going?" 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord::
> 
> Windlord landed and looking to Dragos said "So you have a plan for 
> search your pals???? where we will begin?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > In the forrest where Dragos was last spoted going to SureStrike 
> and the rest of the combiner crew came across a scene. The scene 
> looked like a battle was brought out of know but at the same time 
> everywhere. Almost as if the barriers of the dimensions folded 
into 
> two. SureStrike begins to anlyze the scene. He looks towards 
Cooley 
> and says "Well I can pickup Dragos and Argos weapons fired here. 
But 
> this is confuzing. It is almost as if the other set of weapons 
fire 
> is Identical yet seperate from the Dragos, As if there was a 
clone." 
> Cooley looked towards SureStrike as if in confusion. "How was our 
> weapons cloned. I mean they are designed to use no traceable 
> signal." Cooley said. 
> > 
> > "Well there is a way, But that is if we are cloned." SureStrike 
> replied to Cooley with a concerned look to him. 
> > 
> > "If that is the case then what are we doing we need to find 
Dragos 
> ans Argos before they die. That is if they aren't already dead 
> themselves." replyed Cooley. At that they take off again to check 
> the area for scraps and other parts but they find none. They Soon 
> decide to setup a signal to to Report back to the maximal 
> base. "Maximals this is SureStrike, we are done searching section 
43 
> degrees south by 18 degrees east. We are now moving into the 
> Badlands. Please do not worry bout us. I am setting up this relay 
> station so we could still keep in communication." SureStrike set 
to 
> the base on a repeat loop. to make sure that any maximal will get 
it.
